entry.title: Not Until You Say Goodbye
entry.summary:
Author: Mat_Vibes

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,468Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 12

Summary: What if the end of the world wasn’t just about destruction—but about love rewriting fate?In this story, Tim Drake is pulled into NERV, an organization that controls powerful mechs to fight off monstrous beings known as Angels. But saving the world is only half the battle—he also has to deal with all sorts of problems, especially his love-struck brothers and his own complicated feelings.As Tim faces powerful enemies to protect humanity, love, trust, and heartbreak start to shift the story from a tale of survival to something more—something deeper. Because in a world where everything seems predetermined, can the love between two people be enough to change destiny itself?If you’re looking for an epic mix of high-stakes action, deep emotions, and a love story powerful enough to defy fate—this is for you.

entry.title: performing, or living (the baby girl remix)
entry.summary:
Author: chasm_side

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,183Chapters: 2/12Kudos: 65

Summary: "Everyone tells themselves little stories about who they are," she told him. "Stories about why they do what they do, why they want what they want. And that's fine—telling a story isn't the same as telling a lie, you know?" "Sure," Dick agreed. "It only gets fucked up when you start thinking your story is the only story worth believing," Jay continued. "That you've got some kind of monopoly on truth, that you're the only person who gets to tell other people what's really real. So… if you let me have my little stories, I'll let you have yours. Okay? If you want to believe in Batman, if you need Bruce to be a good father, if you wanna roll around in your shame about not being honest with Daddy about all the awesome sex you're having with the most problematic out of all of Daddy's problem children—I mean, sure, whatever gets you off, right?"

Summary: Nightwing stood up, and the expression on his face made Spoiler step back nervously. His hand unfurled, shaking, revealing a sharp and bloody switchblade. Its body was a beautiful red. A phoenix had been carved into the side. “Somebody was here.” If his voice went any tighter it might shatter. “And we were too late.” (Again, he added in his mind. entry.title: False Front
entry.summary:
Author: SavioroftheStars

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 126,253Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 338

Summary: Dick Grayson is an undercover agent, tasked with infiltrating the Red Hoods, a dangerous new gang with a strict code of ethics. Posing as Ricky Kelly, a former sex worker with a fabricated past, Dick is sent to gain the trust of their leader, the mysterious and unpredictable Red Hood. As he works his way deeper into the gang, Dick quickly realizes that the Red Hoods are unlike any other criminal organization he’s encountered—disciplined, strategic, and governed by a unique moral code.But things become complicated when Dick finds himself developing feelings for their enigmatic leader and growing closer with the people he was sent to deceive.

entry.title: You Are Out of My League
entry.summary:
Author: ivebeenbamboozled (brainwitchletty)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 310,423Chapters: 33/?Kudos: 900

Summary: The story begins with a new Robin to replace the old, with Nightwing none the wiser to being replaced at all, and suddenly he has a little brother within the same terrible day. It takes a while to accept, but Dick quickly learns this new Robin-- Jason Todd-- is exactly what Dick Grayson was always missing in his life, and in many more ways than one. Through the years with the team and working with the Justice League, Jason finds a place for himself and becomes a vital member of the Young Justice League while also becoming a vital centerpiece in Dick's life. And when all that ends-- when Jason Todd is taken away from Dick-- it's going to be even harder to put his life back together with that emptiness returning once more.. . .Mostly canon compliant story detailing Jason's introduction to the Young Justice League as Robin, his eventual death, and Dick discovering the mysterious red-hooded figure acting as Ra's Al Ghul's bodyguard is a lot more familiar than he should be.

entry.title: Last Stand (DickJay Week 2025 Day 6)
entry.summary:
Author: whoevenheckinknows

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,011Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 82

Summary: "Batman… B has fallen. Initiate 'Last Stand'." Or that. Dick's heart sinks. Despite knowing it was a possibility, he hoped it wouldn't come to this. It's supposed to be their last case scenario, as the name suggests, their 'Last Stand'. Dick glances at the machine on the other side of the room. The machine that, when activated, will send Dick and Jason into their own bodies, a few years in the past. The goal is to try and prevent the invasion that is slowly but surely overwhelming them. But… Dick really doesn't want to leave anyone behind.ORDick and Jason get sent into their past bodies, to when Jason first becomes Robin and Dick is Nightwing. And considering how much has changed for them, it's hard for the two to come to terms with what is now their lives.
